attributes.title: SIMPLY THE WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: i got this app expecting very high expertise, intelligent words from our beloved oompa loompa and i was disappointed to see this giant poposturous orange whale, i’m talking GIGANTIC, filled the whole screen. this horrid sight brought tears to my eyes and i haven’t slept in days. i actually called in to be the next dr.phil patient. this was the most traumatic experience i’ve ever endured besides seeing a commercial with this same big porpoise on tv. i mean this creature was the most terrible thing ever. it’s as if big bird was the size of a submarine, got a spray tan, and became one of the members from fnaf. i then realized it was trump when his name came up. oops. 🤮🤮🤮🤮

i’m a big cheeto fan here and to find out that the app has glitched me was heart breaking . after i downloaded the app my mother told me to take out the trash and as i got up to take it outside i lagged. then i tried it again and made it to my trash can then it exploded on me. as a part of this cheeto community i am so i disappointed and disgusted by what this has done to me. it also blew up my phone which lead to my house being burnt down. i am currently in the ER and am typing this on a heart rate monitor. i would please like to contact mr.cheeto to pay for my hospital and house bills please. that’ll be two mil. i shall email you my venmo. thank you for your time and please fix your app. the doctor is taking away the monitor now.
attributes.title: yeah no❤️

attributes.review:
ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING nobody likes Donald trump and when I went in the app it threatened me to eat my vegetables or I’d die the next day and my vegetables started to ATTACK me because of this app! I’m cursed because of Donald trump’s racist disgusting existence! 2020 is cursed because of what he’s done! This app made my dead dog eat my fish and it threw up on my computer so I had to buy another one! I can’t believe u! WW3 of unicorns and asteroids have started because of this app! Every time I look at Donald trump I want to throw myself down a 400 foot building! My sock started running around my house and SLAPPED me with spaghetti because of this app! That is just nonsense! Also what happened to “we will make America great again”? So far America is just trash because of him.

Tiktok 2020!
